        public static objects.Piece[][] buildBoard()
        Builds the chess board with respective pieces in their respective locations
        Returns:
        A 2D Piece array object with all the chess pieces

      • printBoard

        public static void printBoard(objects.Piece[][] board)
        Prints the complete board with checkers and pieces in their respective location.
        Parameters:

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty(objects.Piece[][] board,
                              int x,
                              int y)
        Checks if the spot on the board is empty
        Parameters:
        board - Uses the 2D piece array object
        x - The x coordinate of the piece
        y - The y coordinate of the piece
        Returns:
        true if the coordinate on the board is empty

      • translate

        public static int[] translate(java.lang.String s)
        Translates the human input to a value that can be read by the board.
        Parameters:
        s - The initial and final location of the piece as a string format
        Returns:
        An int[] array object with the translated values
